document_data.name: Greater Glyph of Warding
document_data.Effect: This spell functioned very similarly to the less powerful ''[[Glyph of Warding|glyph of warding]]''. However, this more potent glyph caused far more damage, and the ''greater glyph'' could store a spell that was as powerful as ''[[chain lightning]]'' or lesser.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[somatic]], [[verbal]] and [[material component]]s. The latter component was [[diamond]] dust, which cost at least 400 [[gp]].
